marklogic.body:
I STARTED EBAY TEN YEARS AGO. WHEN I FIRST STARTED IT WAS HARD FOR A BUYER TO EVEN HAVE A VOICE. NOW SELLERS ARE ACTUALLY CLOSED OUT OF EVERYTHING. IT REVOLVES TOTALLY AROUND THE BUYERS WANTS. I HAVE SPOKEN TO EBAY BUT THEIR EXCUSES IS THEY KEEP BUYERS HAPPY TO HELP ME GET MORE BUYERS? HOW THE HECK CAN DISCRIMINATING AGAINST SELLERS DO ANYTHING BUT GIVE BUYERS THE KNOWLEDGE THAT WE HAVE TO TAKE ANYTHING THEY WANT TO THROW AT US. THE FEEDBACK IS A SAMPLE OF THAT. WHY EBAY?? WHEN HAD IT NOT BEEN FOR SELLERS THERE WOULD BE NO CUSTOMERS, NO EBAY. SO HOW CAN YOU ALLOW THEM TO LEAVE NEGATIVE AND AS A SELLER I CAN ONLY LEAVE A POSITIVE OR NOTHING. YOU HAD COME A LONG WAY BABY, BUT IF YOU ARE NOT CAREFUL WE ARE GOING TO ALL BE LOOKING FOR OTHER SELLING SOURCES. WHERE WE ARE TREATED AS EQUALS. I RECENTLY SOLD A 525 DOLLAR ON EBAY, GOT PAID THRU PAYPAL. GOT RIPPED BY THE BUYER AND EBAY YOU DID NOTHING BUT SAY OH WELL YOU JUST LOST IT. I MEAN I SOLD ON YOUR SITE, YOU STATE YOU PROTECT US , BUT I COULDNT EVEN LEAVE THIS LADY A NEGATIVE TO TELL OTHERS SHE WAS A SCAMMER. WHERE HAS YOUR LOYALTY TO SELLERS GONE? ITS GOING TO BE LIKE THE DAM BROKE WHEN WE START GETTING ALL THESE RETURNS. SOMEBODY CAN BUY A NORTHFACE FROM ME IN THE WINTER AND SEND IT BACK IN THE SUMMER FOR A FULL REFUND. AINT GOING TO HAPPEN. I WILL JUST REFUSE TO ACCEPT ANY RETURNS. THEN YOU CAN DEAL WITH ALL THEIR COMPLAININGS.
THANKS, LITERALLY FOR NOTHING. I PAY YOU TO SERVE ME, BUT YOU HAVE BECOME INCAPABLE OF DOING YOUR JOB. MAYBE ITS TIME SELLERS BAN TOGETHER AND ESTABLISH A NEW SELLING SPOT. I WOULD PROBABLY BE FIRST TO SIGN ON. I LOVE EBAY CUSTOMERS, I HAVE MET SOME GREAT PEOPLE BUT HONESTLY I HAVE COME TO HATE EBAY .
